tool_description: Creates, updates, or deletes DNS records in an existing zone with support for all common record types and batch operations.

zone_id.description: DNS zone identifier where records will be managed

action.description: Action to perform: create, update, delete, or list

record_type.description: DNS record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, SRV, etc.)

record_name.description: DNS record name (subdomain or @ for root)

record_value.description: DNS record value (IP address, hostname, text content)

priority.description: Priority value for MX and SRV records (0-65535)

record_id.description: Existing record ID for update or delete operations

error_messages: Invalid zone ID: The specified zone ID does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid action: Action must be one of: create, update, delete, list.
Unsupported record type: The specified DNS record type is not supported.
Invalid record value: The record value format is invalid for the specified record type.
TTL out of range: TTL must be between 300 and 86400 seconds.
Priority required: MX and SRV records require a priority value between 0 and 65535.
Record not found: The specified record ID does not exist in the zone.
usage: Provide zone_id, action, record_type, and record_name. For create/update operations, include record_value and optionally ttl and priority. For update/delete operations, include record_id. The tool performs the specified DNS record operation.

operation_status.description: Status of the DNS record operation

record_id.description: Record identifier for created or modified records

records.description: List of DNS records (for list operations)

changes_applied.description: Number of records affected by the operation
